channel.title: CiTR -- Are You Aware
channel.description: Celebrating the message behind the music: profiling music and musicians that take the route of positive action over apathy.
channel.itunes:summary: Celebrating the message behind the music: profiling music and musicians that take the route of positive action over apathy.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
channel.itunes:subtitle: Music That Has Something To Say

item.title: Are You Aware - Broadcast July 17, 2014
item.description:
Apologies: It was brought to my attention I accidently said that Rob Stark was the director of the documentary Revolution instead of Canadian Rob Stewart. This was an accidental error and was not intentional.
I'm going through Game of Thrones withdrawal, please be understanding.
